Project Description
WpfCustomChromeLibrary makes it easier to create WPF applications with custom chrome and caption buttons (min/max/close). You'll no longer have to do all the dirty work yourself in each application where you want a custom chrome. It's developed in XAML and C#.

This project uses the WPF Shell Integration Library (http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/WPFShell) as a basis for creating windows with custom chrome (WindowStyle="None"), but maintaining standard window title bar functionality, such as double-click to maximize, right-click for system menu, resize by dragging any edge or corner, etc.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
